name: Savanah Wildlife: Animals Sim
description:
Just imagine that you have a chance to live a life of wild savannah animal… Waht animal would it be? Elephants, lions, cheetah, hyena, rhino, buffalo, zebra, hippo… They’re all so amazing! Just choose your favorite one and start this amazing Savannah Wildlife Animals Simulator! Tired of usual animal simulators with no choice? This game is your salvation! Explore wild savannah being one of these beautiful animals!

Run (or step lazily if you’re a hippo or rhino) through this fantastically beautiful place trying to find some food, shelter and friends! Beware of different forest predators, ‘cause they are really dangerous for you – be it crocodile, warthog, leopard, gorilla or camel! Be attentive and careful if you wanna fight them – check your skills first; otherwise your game will be over with your death!

Watch your personal indicators (like energy, health and hunger) and make sure that you’ve slept your fill and filled your little (or not) stomach! Find another animal of your kind to make a family and raise your own clan of hyenas, zebras, hippos, buffaloes, cheetahs and others! Check this amazing Savannah Wildlife Animals Simulator and you absolutely won’t be disappointed!

Earn points for successfully completed exploration and battling missions and unlock new interesting skins for the animal you’ve chosen as a main character! Remember that you can always choose a new one to play for, so just enjoy this outstanding possibility!

Savannah Wildlife Animals Simulator features:
• Various animals to play for (including elephant, lion, cheetah, hyena, rhino, buffalo, zebra and hippo)
• Large savannah territory to explore
• Chance to make your own animal clan
• Wide range of battling and exploration missions

Play our new Savannah Wildlife Animals Simulator game, choose your favorite animal, explore this wild savannah surroundings and have fun using the opportunity to become any of these beautiful animals!
